constructor.details: Set a proxy contract address of AddressResolver if it already exists. If not, set zero address here and call `setAddressResolverImpl` using the implementation address of AddressResolver to create a proxy contract.

params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

params.name: The cache name of the contract

returns.proxyAddress: The proxy address for selected name

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.observationPeriod: The observation period to calculate the volume-weighted average price of transactions

params.liquidationProtocolFeeRate: The liquidation fee rate received by protocol
params.liquidationThresholdRate: The rate used as the auto liquidation threshold
params.liquidatorFeeRate: The liquidation fee rate received by liquidators

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

changeProxyAdmins(address,address[]).notice: Updates admin addresses of proxy contract

getAddress(bytes32).notice: Gets the proxy address fro selected name

getAddressResolverAddress().notice: Gets the proxy address of AddressResolver

setAddressResolverImpl(address).notice: Sets the implementation contract of AddressResolver

setBeaconProxyControllerImpl(address).notice: Sets the implementation contract of CurrencyController

setCurrencyControllerImpl(address).notice: Sets the implementation contract of CurrencyController

setGenesisValueVaultImpl(address).notice: Sets the implementation contract of GenesisValueVault

setLendingMarketControllerImpl(address,u.notice: Sets the implementation contract of LendingMarketController

setReserveFundImpl(address,address).notice: Sets the implementation contract of ReserveFund

setTokenVaultImpl(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Sets the implementation contract of TokenVault

userdoc.notice: Implements the management of proxy contracts. All proxy contracts are deployed from this contract. This contract is also used to update the proxy implementation.
